com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache

Class Persistence.UriUsages

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache.Persistence.UriUsages
  • Enclosing class:
    Persistence

    protected static final class Persistence.UriUsages
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by the classes overriding the Persistence class, so as to keep track of how many time each persisted URI has been accessed.
